media.headline: Solarte's RBI single
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Solarte opens scoring with an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Yangervis Solarte drives in the first run of the game for the Padres with an RBI single that plates Wil Myers in the 1st inning

media.headline: Kershaw tosses the first pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Kershaw throws the first pitch of the season
media.bigblurb: Clayton Kershaw tosses the first pitch of the 2017 season to Manuel Margot at Dodger Stadium

media.headline: Kershaw K's first batter of 2017
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Kershaw tallies first strikeout of 2017
media.bigblurb: Clayton Kershaw strikes out Manuel Margot in the top of the 1st inning, registering his first strikeout of 2017

media.headline: Pederson's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Pederson plates Adrian with a sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Joc Pederson lofts a fly ball to right field deep enough to score Adrian Gonzalez on the sacrifice fly to tie it at 1 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Chacin's first K of 2017
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Chacin registers his first strikeout of 2017
media.bigblurb: Jhoulys Chacin strikes out Yasmani Grandal, notching his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Forsythe's nifty glove flip
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Forsythe uses glove to get a heads-up out
media.bigblurb: Logan Forsythe races in to field Travis Jankowski's bunt attempt and flips the ball to first with his glove to nab him on the heads-up play

media.headline: Margot forgets the count
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Margot attempts to go to first on ball three
media.bigblurb: Manuel Margot loses track of the count and attempts to walk to first on ball three before being called back to finish his at-bat

media.headline: Young sings national anthem
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Brett Young performs the national anthem
media.bigblurb: Country music singer Brett Young sings the national anthem on Opening Day before the Dodgers' matchup vs. the Padres

media.headline: Padres' starters introduced
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Padres' Opening Day lineup introduced
media.bigblurb: Manager Andy Green and the Padres starting lineup are introduced before their game against the Dodgers on Opening Day

media.headline: Dodgers' starters intros
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Dodgers' starters introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Dodgers' starting lineup is introduced on Opening Day before their game against the Padres

media.headline: Lasorda, Moon toss first pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Lasorda, Moon throw Opening Day first pitches
media.bigblurb: Former Dodgers Tommy Lasorda and Wally Moon throw out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day in Los Angeles

media.headline: Pederson's grand slam
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Pederson rips a line-drive grand slam
media.bigblurb: Joc Pederson belts a line-drive grand slam in the bottom of the 3rd inning, giving the Dodgers a 5-1 advantage #PapaSlam

media.headline: Grandal's back-to-back homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Grandal goes back-to-back with Pederson
media.bigblurb: Yasmani Grandal follows Joc Pederson's grand slam with a homer of his own, going back-to-back for a 6-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Turner's RBI double
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Turner extends lead with an RBI double
media.bigblurb: Justin Turner rips a double that nicks the left-field foul line, scoring Clayton Kershaw for a 7-1 lead in the 4th inning

media.team: San Diego Padres Los Angeles Dodgers
media.headline: Turner's double stands
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Turner hits RBI double, call stands
media.bigblurb: The Padres challenge Justin Turner's RBI double questioning whether it was foul and the call stands in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Seager's three-run homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Seager extends lead with a three-run shot
media.bigblurb: Corey Seager boosts the lead to 12-1 with a three-run home run to left-center field in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Moon on throwing first pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Moon discusses first pitch with Lasorda
media.bigblurb: Former Dodgers player Wally Moon talks about throwing out the first pitch alongside Tommy Lasorda on Opening Day against the Padres

media.headline: Davis, Hershiser on Scully
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Davis, Hershiser on replacing Scully
media.bigblurb: Dodgers broadcasters Joe Davis and Orel Hershiser talk about their task of broadcasting after Vin Scully's retirement

media.headline: Diaz's first career strikeout
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Diaz fans Pederson for first career strikeout
media.bigblurb: Miguel Diaz strikes out Joc Pederson looking in the 6th inning, registering his first career strikeout

media.headline: Schimpf's solo homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Schimpf belts a solo smash to right
media.bigblurb: Ryan Schimpf hammers a solo shot over the right-field wall for his first home run of the 2017 season

media.headline: Margot's RBI double
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Margot drives in Jankowski with an RBI double
media.bigblurb: Manuel Margot doubles to the right-center-field gap, scoring Travis Jankowski in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Grandal's two-run homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Grandal hits his second homer of the game
media.bigblurb: Yasmani Grandal belts a two-run homer to left, homering from both sides of the plate to give the Dodgers a 14-3 lead in the 8th

media.headline: Turner trots home on wild pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Turner scores on Bethancourt's wild pitch
media.bigblurb: Justin Turner is able to score on Christian Bethancourt's wild pitch, increasing the lead to 9-1 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Turner doubles in the 3rd
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Turner rips a double off the wall
media.bigblurb: Justin Turner belts a line-drive double off the left-center-field wall in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Myers reaches on an error
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Myers safe at first on Seager's error
media.bigblurb: Wil Myers is able to reach first base safely on Corey Seager's throwing error in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Toles scores on wild pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Toles scores on Bethancourt's wild pitch
media.bigblurb: Andrew Toles is able to score on Christian Bethancourt's wild pitch, increasing the lead to 8-1 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Kershaw K's eight on Opening Day
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Kershaw fans eight in his Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Clayton Kershaw notches eight strikeouts against the Padres in seven outstanding innings, allowing two runs to earn the win

media.headline: Grandal belts two home runs
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Grandal homers from both sides of the plate
media.bigblurb: Yasmani Grandal homers from the left side in the bottom of the 3rd inning and belts a two-run shot from the right side in the 8th inning

media.headline: Dodgers slug back-to-back jacks
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Pederson, Grandal hit back-to-back homers
media.bigblurb: Joc Pederson clears the bases with a grand slam and Yasmani Grandal follows with a homer to go back-to-back in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Green on rough loss to Dodgers
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Green on 14-3 Opening Day loss to Dodgers
media.bigblurb: Padres manager Andy Green discusses Jhoulys Chacin's rough outing and the team's lack of success against Clayton Kershaw in their 14-3 loss

media.headline: Roberts on win over the Padres
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Roberts on offense in Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts says the team couldn't be in a better spot as they open the season with a victory over the Padres

media.headline: Recap: SD 3, LAD 14
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Dodgers belt four homers in Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Joc Pederson hit a grand slam and Yasmani Grandal belted two homers to back Clayton Kershaw's great start in a 14-3 win

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: SD@LAD
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD

media.headline: Pederson on his five-RBI game
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Pederson talks grand slam, five-RBI game
media.bigblurb: Joc Pederson discusses his grand slam in the Dodgers' 14-3 win over the Padres

media.headline: Grandal, Seager on Dodgers' win
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Grandal, Seager on Opening Day victory
media.bigblurb: Yasmani Grandal and Corey Seager discuss the Dodgers' Opening Day win over the Padres as they combined for three home runs

media.headline: Kershaw on Opening Day win
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Kershaw breaks down his Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Clayton Kershaw talks about his pitching performance in his team's 14-3 win over the Padres on Opening Day

media.headline: Kershaw dominates on Opening Day
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Kershaw's sizzling start to the 2017 season
media.bigblurb: Clayton Kershaw keeps his Opening Day record perfect, two-hitting the Padres over seven innings and adding a base knock of his own
